data.name: Hazmat Magic
data.detailed_description:
A young woman sees her lost brother in her dreams. His calls for help lead her to a mysterious and magical factory.

HAZMAT MAGIC is a cute-2d-pixelart-puzzle-platformer about mixing hazardous materials as a bumbling new employee at a magical chemical factory!

- Mix colorful chemicals to unlock powers like super jumps and grapple beams!
- Use your knowledge of magical chemistry to solve whacky puzzles!
- Uncover the mysteries of Hazmat Magic Inc.

"Hazmat Magic Inc., Your value-added source for non-kinetic solids, super-jump compounds, and anti-gravity solutions, ideal for magic manufacturing and general wizardry."
